short_summary: Contract for 2 yrs with option to extend for 3yrs
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Shared Services Canada – Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)**
=====================================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Solicitation Number:** R000127299
**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada

**Tender Description:**
Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals for a Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) contract, specifically for the Quality Management Program (Tier 1).

**Background:**
The contract will involve the provision of technical writing services to support Shared Services Canada’s (SSC’s) quality management program. The anticipated start date is April 1, 2023, and the estimated delivery date is March 31, 2025.

**Requirements:**

* Technical writing services with a focus on quality management
* Estimated level of effort: 192 days per resource, yearly
* Contract duration: Two (2) years, plus three (3) one-year options
* Security requirement: Minimum corporate security required: DOS - Reliability; Minimum resource security required: Reliability

**Eligibility:**
This requirement is open only to TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region. SSC intends to award one (1) contract to a qualified SA Holder.

**Invitation to Bid:**
The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
